name: Processed Engagement Letters Directory
description: Set the directory where processed engagement letters will be saved. By default, all processed files are saved to 'temp/complete'.

name: Cache Type
description: Set what cache type Flask uses. By default, FileSystemCache is used.

name: Daily Limit
description: Set the daily rate limit for requests to the Flask backend. By default, this is set to 1000 per day.

name: Hourly Limit
description: Set the hourly rate limit for requests to the Flask backend. By default, this is set to 240 per hour.
